QuestData.Title: The Apprentice's Request
QuestData.Description: As an apprentice wind rider master, one of my tasks is to care for the beasts when they're not flying. The problem is that we have so few here, there's very little downtime for any of them.$B$BI'm afraid we'll work them all to death if we don't receive any replacements. There's a large stable down in Shadowmoon Village, in western Shadowmoon Valley. Dama Wildmane oversees the wind rider care and training there.$B$BWould you speak with her on our behalf and let her know about our situation?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Dama Wildmane at Shadowmoon Village in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.RewardText: <Dama listens to Agadai's request.>$B$BI can't guarantee that there will be any wind riders available, but I'll see what I can do. As it is, we're having trouble keeping up with the demands of other buyers and outposts.
